description: An excel spreadsheet containing social characteristic data for all Boston neighborhoods from the American Community Survey 2005-2009. The data in this spreadsheet were used to create the BRA's ACS neighborhood reports.

name: Social Characteristic data, all neighborhoods: American Community Survey, 2005-2009
